向き直る: (むきなおる) - to turn round; to face about; to turn about
向く: (むく) - to face; to turn toward; to be suited to/to be fit for
向け: (muke) - destinado a ..., voltado para ..., direcionado a ...
向ける: (むける) - to turn towards; to point
向こう: (むこう) - opposite side/other side/opposite direction; over there/that way/far away/beyond; the other party/the other person; future (starting now)
向こうぎし: (むこうぎし) - opposite bank; farther shore
向こうずね: (むこうずね) - shin; front of lower leg
向こうで暮らす: (むこうでくらす) - to live overseas
向こうに回して: (むこうにまわして) - in opposition to

向こうみず: (むこうみず) - recklessness; rashness; foolhardiness; temerity; without watching where one is going
向こうもち: (むこうもち) - covered by the other party (usu. expenses)
向こうを張る: (むこうをはる) - to vie with one's opponent
向こう三軒: (むこうさんげん) - one's next three neighbors; one's next three neighbours
向こう側: (むこうがわ) - other side; opposite side; other party
向こう傷: (むこうきず) - scar on one's forehead; frontal wound
向こう向き: (むこうむき) - facing the other way
向こう岸: (むこうぎし) - opposite bank; farther shore
向こう持ち: (むこうもち) - covered by the other party (usu. expenses)
向こう正面: (むこうじょうめん) - opposite the front/front seats in a theater/stalls/orchestra seats; {sumo} (seat facing) south side of ring
向こう疵: (むこうきず) - scar on one's forehead; frontal wound
向こう脛: (むこうずね) - shin; front of lower leg
向こう見ず: (むこうみず) - recklessness; rashness; foolhardiness; temerity; without watching where one is going
向こう鉢巻: (むこうはちまき) - folded or rolled head towel; towel twisted around one's head
向こう鉢巻き: (むこうはちまき) - folded or rolled head towel; towel twisted around one's head
向上: (こうじょう) - elevation; rise; improvement; advancement; progress
向上心: (こうじょうしん) - ambition; aspiration; desire to improve oneself
向付: (むこうづけ) - dish placed on the far side of the serving table (kaiseki cuisine)/side dishes at a banquet (e.g. sashimi, salad, vinegared dish; not rice or soup); {sumo} resting one's forehead on the chest of one's opponent and grabbing his belt
向付け: (むこうづけ) - dish placed on the far side of the serving table (kaiseki cuisine)/side dishes at a banquet (e.g. sashimi, salad, vinegared dish; not rice or soup); {sumo} resting one's forehead on the chest of one's opponent and grabbing his belt
向地性: (こうちせい) - the nature of plants to grow down and root; geotropism
向学心: (こうがくしん) - love of learning
向岸: (むこうぎし) - opposite bank; farther shore
向拝: (こうはい) - pent roof built atop the stairs of a shrine or temple
向日性: (こうにちせい) - heliotropism; actinotropism; disposition (in flowers) to turn toward the sun; phototropism
向日葵: (ヒマワリ) - (向日葵 is irregular) sunflower (Helianthus annuus)
向精神薬: (こうせいしんやく) - psychotropic drug
向背: (こうはい) - one's attitude; state of affairs
向附: (むこうづけ) - dish placed on the far side of the serving table (kaiseki cuisine)/side dishes at a banquet (e.g. sashimi, salad, vinegared dish; not rice or soup); {sumo} resting one's forehead on the chest of one's opponent and grabbing his belt
君: (kun/kimi) - you , you, buddy, pal; monarch, ruler, sovereign, (one's) master
君が世: (きみがよ) - Imperial reign; title of Japanese national anthem
君が代: (きみがよ) - Imperial reign; title of Japanese national anthem
君が代蘭: (きみがよらん) - curve-leaf yucca (Yucca recurvifolia)
君の瞳に乾杯: (きみのひとみにかんぱい) - (from the movie Casablanca) Here's looking at you, kid; Here's cheers to your eyes
君ら: (きみら) - you guys; buddies; pals; you lot
君主道徳: (くんしゅどうとく) - Herrenmoral (master morality, as a philosophical concept of Nietzsche)
君側: (くんそく) - proximity of a monarch or lord
君側の奸: (くんそくのかん) - someone who curries favor with their master while secretly plotting against him
君命: (くんめい) - the orders of one's ruler
君国: (くんこく) - monarchy; monarch and nation
君子: (くんし) - man of virtue; person of high rank; wise man
君子危うきに近寄らず: (くんしあやうきにちかよらず) - A wise man keeps away from danger
君子蘭: (くんしらん) - clivia (esp. drooping clivia, Clivia nobilis); Kaffir lily (Clivia miniata)
君子豹変: (くんしひょうへん) - (yoji) the wise readily adapt themselves to changed circumstances/the wise are quick to acknowledge their mistakes and correct them; (in colloquial usage, ironically or as an excuse) the wise make no scruple in suddenly changing their demeanor
君子豹変す: (くんしひょうへんす) - A wise man changes his mind, a fool never
君寵: (くんちょう) - the favor of one's ruler (favour)
君恩: (くんおん) - the favor of one's ruler (favour)
君沢形: (きみさわがた) - schooner style ship built at the end of the Shogunate
君父の讐は倶に天を戴かず: (くんぷのあだはともにてんをいただかず) - (proverb) (from the Book of Rites)  not wanting to live in the same world as one's father's or lord's enemies; being prepared to sacrifice one's life to avenge one's father or lord
君等: (きみら) - you guys; buddies; pals; you lot
君臣: (くんしん) - ruler and ruled; master and servant
君臨: (くんりん) - reigning/controlling; to reign/to dictate/to control
君達: (きんだち) - kings; children of nobles; young nobleman
吝かでない: (やぶさかでない) - ready (to do); willing
吝かで無い: (やぶさかでない) - ready (to do); willing
吝しむ: (おしむ) - to be frugal/to be sparing; to value/to hold dear; to regret (e.g. a loss)/to feel sorry (for); to be unwilling/to be reluctant
